Description: 27: sub-surface gliders (buoyancy-based propulsion capable at variable depths not constrained to be near sea surface)
34: Vessel at fixed position - Includes light vessels and weather ships
35: Vessel of opportunity on fixed route
48: Mooring - tethered collection of instruments at a fixed location that may include seafloor  mid water or surface components
51: free-rising balloon (constrained to rise vertically at fixed location)
93: pack ice (not connected to land with ice concentration over 70%)
94: drift ice (not connected to land with ice concentration under 70%)
